alert.note: Alert for Kent; New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued December 16 at 1:58PM EST until December 18 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...New Castle and Kent. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...At this level, widespread roadway flooding occurs along tidal waterways. Some roads become impassable. Minor damage to vulnerable structures may begin to occur. At this level, widespread roadway flooding occurs in coastal and bayside communities and along inland tidal waterways. Many roads become impassable. Some damage to vulnerable structures may begin to occur. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Delaware River at Reedy Point MLLW Categories - Minor 7.2 ft, Moderate 8.2 ft, Major 9.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.4 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 16/01 PM 5.9 0.1 0.3 None 17/02 AM 5.7 -0.1 1.2 None 17/02 PM 7.2 1.4 1.7 Minor 18/03 AM 8.4 2.6 3.8 Moderate 18/03 PM 6.7 0.9 1.3 None 19/04 AM 5.7 -0.1 1.0 None Murderkill River at Bowers Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 6.6 ft, Moderate 7.6 ft, Major 8.6 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 0.9 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 2.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 17/12 AM 5.2 -0.5 1.3 None 17/01 PM 7.1 1.4 1.8 Minor 18/01 AM 7.7 2.0 3.7 Moderate 18/01 PM 6.8 1.1 1.8 Minor 19/02 AM 5.4 -0.3 1.3 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
